languages.text: "Святой Трон, вот откуда я помню этот голос! Я видел тебя однажды, сопровождая Леди Теодору. Тогда ты еще не был... таким. Но она не говорила, что ты ее брат. Почему?"

"By the Holy Throne, so that's where I remember that voice from! I saw you once when I was accompanying Lady Theodora. You weren't... as you are now, back then. But she never spoke of you as her brother. Why?"
languages.original_text: "Святой Трон, вот откуда я помню этот голос! Я видел тебя однажды, сопровождая Леди Теодору. Тогда ты еще не был... таким. Но она не говорила, что ты ее брат. Почему?"

traits.locale_text: "By the Holy Throne, so that's where I remember that voice from! I saw you once when I was accompanying Lady Theodora. You weren't... as you are now, back then. But she never spoke of you as her brother. Why?"

"By the Holy Throne, so that's where I remember that voice from! I saw you once when I was accompanying Lady Theodora. You weren't... as you are now, back then. But she never spoke of you as her brother. Why?"

"By the Holy Throne, so that's where I remember that voice from! I saw you once when I was accompanying Lady Theodora. You weren't... as you are now, back then. But she never spoke of you as her brother. Why?"

languages.text: «Por el Trono Sagrado, ¡por eso recuerdo la voz! Le vi una vez cuando acompañaba a lady Theodora. No era... como ahora en aquella época, pero nunca se refirió a usted como su hermano. ¿Por qué?».
languages.original_text: "By the Holy Throne, so that's where I remember that voice from! I saw you once when I was accompanying Lady Theodora. You weren't... as you are now, back then. But she never spoke of you as her brother. Why?"

traits.locale_text: «Por el Trono Sagrado, ¡por eso recuerdo la voz! Le vi una vez cuando acompañaba a lady Theodora. No era... como ahora en aquella época, pero nunca se refirió a usted como su hermano. ¿Por qué?».

languages.text: “黄金王座在上，怪不得你的声音这么耳熟！我还在西奥多拉夫人身边的时候，曾经见过你一次。当时的你……和现在不太一样。不过，她从来没提过你是她哥哥，这是怎么回事？”
languages.original_text: "By the Holy Throne, so that's where I remember that voice from! I saw you once when I was accompanying Lady Theodora. You weren't... as you are now, back then. But she never spoke of you as her brother. Why?"

traits.locale_text: “黄金王座在上，怪不得你的声音这么耳熟！我还在西奥多拉夫人身边的时候，曾经见过你一次。当时的你……和现在不太一样。不过，她从来没提过你是她哥哥，这是怎么回事？”

languages.text: 「聖なる王座よ、どおりで声に聞き覚えがあったんだ！レディ・シオドーラについていったとき、確かに一度あなたを見たことがある。あの頃のあなたは、今のようじゃなかった。でも、彼女は兄としてあなたのことを話したことはなかった。どうしてだろう？」
languages.original_text: "By the Holy Throne, so that's where I remember that voice from! I saw you once when I was accompanying Lady Theodora. You weren't... as you are now, back then. But she never spoke of you as her brother. Why?"

traits.locale_text: 「聖なる王座よ、どおりで声に聞き覚えがあったんだ！レディ・シオドーラについていったとき、確かに一度あなたを見たことがある。あの頃のあなたは、今のようじゃなかった。でも、彼女は兄としてあなたのことを話したことはなかった。どうしてだろう？」

languages.text: "Beim heiligen Thron. Deshalb kommt mir die Stimme so bekannt vor! Ich habe Euch einmal gesehen, als ich Lady Theodora begleitet habe. Ihr wart damals ... anders als heute. Aber sie hat Euch nie als Bruder bezeichnet. Warum?"
languages.original_text: "By the Holy Throne, so that's where I remember that voice from! I saw you once when I was accompanying Lady Theodora. You weren't... as you are now, back then. But she never spoke of you as her brother. Why?"

traits.locale_text: "Beim heiligen Thron. Deshalb kommt mir die Stimme so bekannt vor! Ich habe Euch einmal gesehen, als ich Lady Theodora begleitet habe. Ihr wart damals ... anders als heute. Aber sie hat Euch nie als Bruder bezeichnet. Warum?"

languages.text: « Par le saint Trône, je comprends à présent pourquoi votre voix me semblait familière ! Je vous ai vu, une fois, alors que j'accompagnais dame Théodora. En ce temps-là, vous étiez... très différent de ce que vous êtes aujourd'hui. Cela étant dit, elle n'a jamais évoqué votre lien de parenté. Pourquoi ? »
languages.original_text: "By the Holy Throne, so that's where I remember that voice from! I saw you once when I was accompanying Lady Theodora. You weren't... as you are now, back then. But she never spoke of you as her brother. Why?"

traits.locale_text: « Par le saint Trône, je comprends à présent pourquoi votre voix me semblait familière ! Je vous ai vu, une fois, alors que j'accompagnais dame Théodora. En ce temps-là, vous étiez... très différent de ce que vous êtes aujourd'hui. Cela étant dit, elle n'a jamais évoqué votre lien de parenté. Pourquoi ? »

languages.text: "Kutsal Taht adına... Ben de bu sesi nereden tanıyorum diyordum! Bir keresinde Leydi Theodora'ya eşlik ettiğin sırada görmüştüm. O zamanlar böyle değildin. Ağabeyi olduğunu söylememişti. Neden ki?"
languages.original_text: "By the Holy Throne, so that's where I remember that voice from! I saw you once when I was accompanying Lady Theodora. You weren't... as you are now, back then. But she never spoke of you as her brother. Why?"

traits.locale_text: "Kutsal Taht adına... Ben de bu sesi nereden tanıyorum diyordum! Bir keresinde Leydi Theodora'ya eşlik ettiğin sırada görmüştüm. O zamanlar böyle değildin. Ağabeyi olduğunu söylememişti. Neden ki?"
